entries.description: SIS defines mandatory pre-launch initialization actions but does not explicitly define system behavior if initialization is partially completed or interrupted before launch declaration.
entries.impact: Human operators may need to infer recovery steps in edge cases such as aborted initialization runs.
entries.recommendedPosture: Document fallback behavior without altering initialization guarantees.

rules: Weak doctrine is not an error.
Entries must reference exact Codex locations.
No amendments or rewrites may occur during registration.
Strengthening recommendations, if any, must preserve original intent.
Absence of entries is a valid recorded outcome.
